plot: A story about a quirky young guy and how he came to believe that the dreams he has are actually a blueprint of his waking life. A belief that he thinks led him to the best friend he'd ever have...and love of his life.
title: The Specifics
plot_es: A story about a quirky young guy and how he came to believe that the dreams he has are actually a blueprint of his waking life. A belief that he thinks led him to the best friend he'd ever have...and love of his life.
plot_en: A story about a quirky young guy and how he came to believe that the dreams he has are actually a blueprint of his waking life. A belief that he thinks led him to the best friend he'd ever have...and love of his life.
